home.title: Home
home.description: May peace and blessings be with you always
home.dailyReminder0: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding.
home.dailyReminder1: And to your Lord direct your longing.
home.dailyReminder2: And do good; indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
home.dailyReminder3: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
home.dailyReminder4: Indeed, with hardship comes ease. So when you have finished, then stand up for worship. And to your Lord direct your longing.
home.dailyReminder5: O you who have believed, when the call is made for prayer on the day of Jumu'ah, then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade.
home.dailyReminder6: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
Barakah Furqan respects your privacy. This policy explains what data and permissions are used to provide app features.

Data/permissions used:
‚Ä¢ Location for Qibla direction and prayer times.
‚Ä¢ Microphone for recitation practice.
‚Ä¢ Internet connection to fetch prayer times and Quran data.
‚Ä¢ Online speech recognition for recitation analysis.

How we use data:
‚Ä¢ To run core features on your device.
‚Ä¢ To improve app reliability and support.

Data sharing:
‚Ä¢ We do not sell your data.
‚Ä¢ Some features use third-party services (e.g., prayer times and speech recognition) that process data according to their policies.

Security:
‚Ä¢ We take reasonable measures to protect your data.

Children's privacy:
‚Ä¢ The app is for general audiences and does not knowingly collect personal data from children.

Contact:
‚Ä¢ Email: dgirsandi@gmail.com
